tool.name: DetectFractionChange

param.name: in_project_file
param.dialogReference: Every site has a unique meta.json file in its project folder. Find and select this file to set the current site containing the UAV image you want to asses fractional change for.

param.name: in_capture_datetime
param.dialogReference: Set the UAV image for which fractional cover images have been previously generated for, based on the date and time it was flown. If fractional cover images have not been generated yet, run the "Generate Fractions" tool first.

param.name: in_s2_to_year
param.dialogReference: Set the "to" fractional cover image year. This will be compared to the "from" or "baseline" fractional cover image.

param.name: in_s2_month
param.dialogReference: Set the month of the fractional cover images to assess change for.

tool.summary: Perform a change detection between two fractional cover dates. Significant positive and negative changes between the two fraction images are then obtained using a global Z-Score method to detect outliers.
